skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mathematics guru
des:
Select a number and Alexa will give you math operations and another number for the operation. This Alexa skill helps kids to start and master mental math abilities in a fun and interactive game.

How to play:
1) start by saying "start mathematics guru".
2) The skills should reply with "Welcome to the mathematics guru. Start by saying a number"
3) The user should speak a number after this. This number will be considered as one of the operands
4) Alexa will announce another number along with an operand.
5) The user is now supposed to perform the operation on the operands and announce the result to alexa.
6) If the answer is correct, Alexa will say another number and another operand.
7) The user gets 3 chances to find the correct answer.
8) the user can say exit if he wants to quit.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
